attributes.action: Ensure food & drink packaging/containers are 100% recyclable and 100% reusable.
attributes.additional_details: By bringing about the aforementioned, the UK Government could reduce methane, sulphur dioxide and carbon dioxide entering our atmosphere unnecessarily.
attributes.background: Food and drink containers must be 100% recyclable as a minimum requirement and 100% reusable as a maximum goal.  Additionally, roll out a National Deposit/Return Scheme, to achieve Zero Landfill Waste in the UK.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about food packaging, however it's not clear what specific actions you want the Government to take in order to achieve these targets. Further, certain materials are reusable but not recyclable, such as polystyrene packing 'pellets', so it's not clear how any such target would work.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:

'Ban the use of plastic food packaging': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595495

'Require plastic food containers to contain a minimum percentage recycled plastic': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596546

'Ban plastic packaging for fruit and vegetables': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600128
